title: NFL on Thanksgiving: Cowboys v Chiefs updates, Lions 24-31 Packers – live
summary: Graham Searles will host a Thanksgiving double-header featuring Week 13 of the NFL. The first game sees the Green Bay Packers defeat the Detroit Lions 31-24. The day continues with a matchup between the Dallas Cowboys and Kansas City Chiefs.

title: Australia news live: NSW axes heritage protection for brumbies; PM hails ‘yes-olition’ as environment laws pass parliament
summary: Please provide the news article or details you would like summarized, and I'll be happy to help!

title: A sliding doors moment meant 11-year-old Leo walked free. Do NSW law changes risk locking more children up?
summary: Leo was acquitted of 72 charges, but recent changes to the law in New South Wales may impact future cases involving children. These legal adjustments could lead to different outcomes for similar offences. The implications of these changes will be closely monitored as they come into effect.

title: Hong Kong police say unsafe scaffolding and foam may have spread fire that killed at least 94
summary: Three construction workers were arrested as firefighters worked to rescue individuals trapped at a construction site, where multiple people remain unaccounted for. Emergency responders are facing challenges in accessing the site. Search and rescue efforts continue amid rising concerns for those missing.

title: Defiant Arne Slot vows to ‘fight on’ after meeting with Liverpool sporting director
summary: Arne Slot has expressed his commitment to continue as Liverpool's manager despite recent heavy defeats to Nottingham Forest and PSV Eindhoven. He emphasized that he still has the backing of the club’s leadership. Slot remains determined to turn the team's performance around.
